summary: A shady lawyer attempts a Christmas Eve crime, hoping to swindle the local mob out of some money. But his partner, a strip club owner, might have different plans for the cash.
cast: John Cusack|Billy Bob Thornton|Lara Phillips|Bill Noble|Brad Smith|Ned Bellamy|Connie Nielsen|Mike Starr|T.J. Jagodowski|Meghan Maureen McDonough|Tab Baker|Frank Gallo|William Dick|Oliver Platt|David Pasquesi|Laura Whyte|Steve King|Caroline Gehrke|Justine Bentley|Max Kirsch|Shana Goodsell|Ryan Ourth|Mick Napier|Lindsay Porter|Brendan Donaldson|Randy Quaid|Shelby Hyman|Meredith Maresh|Dalton J. Homer Spaulding|Joseph Luis Caballero|Diane Frances Fisher|Lori Ann Gerdisch|Michael Kilcullen|Yuri Rutman|Michael Stailey|Rick Touhy|Jenny Wade|Dazelle Yvette
title: La cosecha de hielo
